Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Book = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true local vCharacter
local leftHandWeld local bookClone local spark
local bookSound
local spellAOE = Vector3.new(20.0, 20.0, 20.0)
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myTorso == nil then return end
vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
bookSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("BookSound") if bookSound then bookSound:Play() end
leftArm = vCharacter["Left Arm"]
if leftArm then bookClone = Book:Clone() bookClone.Parent = vCharacter
spark = Instance.new("Sparkles") spark.Parent = bookClone
bookWeld = Instance.new("Weld") bookWeld.Part0 = leftArm bookWeld.Part1 = bookClone bookWeld.Name = "LeftGrip" bookWeld.Parent = leftArm bookWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(-1.2, 0.0, 0.0)) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0.0, math.pi/2)
Book.Transparency = 1.2 end
parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(myTorso.Position - spellAOE, myTorso.Position+spellAOE), vCharacter, 100) for i =1, #parts do tempChar = parts[i].Parent tempHumanoid = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if tempHumanoid ~= nil then slow = tempHumanoid:FindFirstChild("Slow") if slow == nil then newScript = Tool.BookInsertScript:Clone() newScript.Parent = tempChar newScript.Disabled = false
slow = Instance.new("StringValue") slow.Name = "Slow" slow.Value = "Slow" slow.Parent = tempHumanoid
creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = tempHumanoid creatorTag.Value = vPlayer end end end
wait(4.0) spark:Remove() Tool.Enabled = true bookClone:Remove() Book.Transparency = 0.0 end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if bookClone then bookClone:Remove() end Book.Transparency = 0.0 if spark then spark:Remove() end if bookSound then bookSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local vChar = script.Parent local humanoid = vChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
local curse = math.random(1, 100)
if humanoid ~= nil then if curse < 15 then if humanoid.Health > 1 then humanoid.Health = 1 end elseif curse > 15 and curse < 40 then humanoid.WalkSpeed = 4.0 wait(10.0) humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0
elseif curse > 40 and curse < 70 then humanoid.Health = humanoid.Health * 0.5 humanoid.MaxHealth = 50.0
wait(10.0) humanoid.MaxHealth = 100.0 if humanoid.Health * 2.0 <= humanoid.MaxHealth then humanoid.Health = humanoid.Health * 2.0 else humanoid.Health = 100 end
else humanoid.Health = humanoid.Health - 10 humanoid.WalkSpeed = 12.0 wait(10.0) humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end
humanoid = vChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") print(tag) local slow = humanoid:FindFirstChild("Slow") print(slow)
if tag then tag:Remove() end if slow then slow:Remove() end
script:Remove()

local Tool = script.Parent
-- Animations local staffAnim
function onActivatedL() vCharacter = Tool.Parent
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
if Tool.Enabled then staffAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.BookAnim) staffAnim:Play() end end
function onEquippedL() end
function onUnequippedL() if staffAnim then staffAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivatedL) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedL) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedL)
